common.sizingBarSplashNoFit: Syötä mittasi, niin suosittelemme sinulle oikean koon
common.sizingBarSplashNoSize: Valitse koko, niin näytämme miten se sopii sinulle
common.sizingBarFitTooltip: Tämä näyttää miten koko {{selectedSize}} sopii sinulle
common.sizingBarRecommendationTooltip: Tämän tuotteen kohdalla suosittelemme tätä sopivuutta

measurementGuide.title: Näin mittaat:
measurementGuide.chest:
Measure around your body under your arms at fullest part of chest while wearing bra.

Breathe out fully while taking this measurement.
measurementGuide.front_height: Measure down from where your neck meets your shoulder directly down to your waistband (where you normally keep your pants).
measurementGuide.sleeve: Measure from your shoulder (where your shirt's seam usually is) down to your wrist (to the end of the radius bone to be exact). Keep your arm straight and pointing down while measuring.
measurementGuide.pant_waist:
Measure around your body from where you normally keep your pants, about 6 cm down from belly-button height.

Pull your stomach in like you are fitting on a pair of tight pants.
measurementGuide.outseam: Measure the outside of your leg starting from the top of your waistband (where you normally keep your pants) and measure down to your ankle bone (lateral malleolus to be exact).
measurementGuide.shoe_inside_length: Aseta mittanauha lattialle seinän viereen ja astu nauhan päälle paljain jaloin kantapää seinässä kiinni
measurementGuide.calf_width: Measure around widest part of calf.
measurementGuide.hat_width: Measure the biggest circumference of head at just above top of ears.

chest: Around your body under your arms at fullest part of chest
front_height: From where your neck meets your shoulder directly down to your waistband
sleeve: From your shoulder down to your wrist
Keep your arm straight and pointing down
pant_waist: Around your body from where you normally keep your pants
Pull your stomach in like you are fitting on a pair of tight pants
hips: Around your body at the widest part of your hips
outseam: The outside of your leg starting from the top of your waistband
Measure down to your ankle bone
shoe_inside_length: Aseta mittanauha lattialle seinän viereen ja astu nauhan päälle paljain jaloin kantapää seinässä kiinni
calf_width: Measure around widest part of calf
hat_width: Measure the biggest circumference of head at just above top of ears

message.noTopButton: Paidan ylin nappi ei tässä koossa mene kiinni.

sizeGuide.measurementDisclaimer: Nämä mitat on otettu <u>tuotteen päältä tasaisella alustalla</u>.
sizeGuide.measurementDisclaimerCollar: Paitsi kaulus, joka on ympärysmitta kauluksen sisäpuolelta.

splash.detailedText: Ota muutama mitta itsestäsi ja näe miten tämä tuote sopisi sinulle. Luo oma SizeMe-tunnus ja lopeta arvailu!
